main_definition: Fingers are the long, slender digits extending from the hand.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To touch or handle something with one's fingers
meanings_and_examples.example: She used her fingers to feel the texture of the fabric.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Points on a person's hand, typically five in humans and four in some other primates
meanings_and_examples.example: He counted his fingers as a way to remember how many were present.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of measurement equivalent to one-twelfth the length of an adult male finger
meanings_and_examples.example: The tailor measured the customer's waist using fingers, counting by increments of four and a half fingers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom that refers to having or showing a high degree of skill in something
meanings_and_examples.example: She is a master with her violin; she can play any piece flawlessly with just her fingers.
